author: Will Knight
title: China Goes Back to Work as the Coronavirus Rages On Elsewhere
description: Big companies are recalling workers, with safety precautions. Malls and restaurants are reopening to crowds.
content: In November, the Beijing offices of Meituan Dianping, a Chinese ecommerce and food delivery business, were buzzing. Workers hunched over computers elbow-to-elbow and held impromptu standup meetings while a prototype snack robot, resembling a trash can with a … [+4761 chars]
